in this post, i'm questioning the irony of people sharing their personal information on social media platforms while being concerned about data privacy. i'm also asking for suggestions on how to protect oneself in such situations. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsph√§re (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post with ongoing discussions around data privacy on social media.
